Title: June 2014
Content: 9*p42922a0924*turn over     (a) the genetic relationship between these two species of grey tree frog has been studied using dna profiling (dna fingerprinting).  a small sample of dna was taken from each species of grey tree frog.  this dna was amplified, fragmented and used to produce a dna profile (dna fingerprint) for each species.   *(i) describe how a dna profile was produced from this small sample of dna.(6)
